TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_China, title = China, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/China} }

S.FORM: China hya' ga cyux maki' tay 35 00 N, 105 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 9,596,960 sq km (maki' tay 4ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 9,326,410 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 270,550 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 1,373,541,278. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 54.70% , lhlahuy hya' ga 22.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 23%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Beijing snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpuw byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Xi Jinping, aring ryax 15 squ byacing tay 11 sa kawas 2012 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

China hya' ga cyox maki' tay 35 00 N, 105 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 9,596,960 sq km (maki' tay 4ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 9,326,410 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 270,550 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 1,373,541,278. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 54.70% , lhlahoy hya' ga 22.30%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 23%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Beijing snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mawpow byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Xi Jinping, aring ryax 15 sqo byacing tay 11 sa kawas 2012 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
